author: mhodge
title: Inside the world’s sex capital Pattaya, Thailand dubbed the ‘modern-day Sodom and Gomorrah’ where 27,000 prostitutes offer services to over a million tourists
text:
Opinion 'BAD GUYS GO TO PATTAYA' Inside the world’s sex capital Pattaya, Thailand dubbed the ‘modern-day Sodom and Gomorrah’ where 27,000 prostitutes offer services to over a million tourists 
The sex industry Thailand faces an uncertain future with the government promising to clamp down on illegal brothels By MARK HODGE, JON LOCKETT and LUKE WILLIAMS 17th February 2017, 9:16 am
